name: Your Name
about: I have a total experience of 6 years. I started my career at Urjanet Energy Solutions as a Data Analyst for 1 year. Then I switched my career to Frontend Development in my second year at FIS Global Solutions. After gaining 3 years of experience, I moved to Tata Consultancy Services where I have been working for more than 2 years now.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A responsive personal portfolio website to showcase my work and experience.

projects.title: E-commerce Frontend
projects.description: Built the frontend of an e-commerce website using React and Redux.

projects.title: Dashboard Application
projects.description: Created a real-time data visualization dashboard for energy consumption analytics.
